sentences.en: He hacked ( away ) at the branch until it fell off.
sentences.cn: 他朝着树枝 ( 不停地 ) 砍,直到砍下为止.

sentences.en: He hacked at the branch until it fell off.
sentences.cn: 他朝着树枝砍,直到砍下来为止.

sentences.en: He hacked at the branch until it fell to the ground.
He hacked away at the trees all night.
He hacked the padlock off the door.
sentences.cn: 他把门上的挂锁砸掉了.

sentences.en: I hacked the dead branches off.
Kim even hacked off her long hair.
sentences.cn: 金甚至剪掉了她的长发。

sentences.en: Matthew desperately hacked through the leather.
sentences.cn: 马修拼命地将皮革砍穿。

sentences.en: One of the police officers was hacked to death by the mob.
sentences.cn: 一名警官被暴徒砍死了.

sentences.en: Some were hacked to death with machetes.
Surgeons saved a man's arm after it was hacked off at the elbow.
sentences.cn: 一位男子的手臂从肘部被砍下，经外科医生实施手术后得以保住了手臂。

sentences.en: The men hacked away very little shrubbery.
The saboteurs had demanded money in return for revealing how they hacked into the systems.
sentences.cn: 那些故意破坏者索要钱财，以作为透露自己是如何非法进入该电脑系统的交换条件。

sentences.en: We hacked our way through the thick jungle.
sentences.cn: 我们在茂密的森林中辟出了一条道路.

phrases.tran_cn: 侵入，潜入（他人电脑）；私自存取或篡改（他人电脑资料）

trans.tran_cn: 劈，砍( hack的过去式和过去分词 )，狠踢，乱踢，能╱不能应付（某情形），（以普通速度）骑马
